  • Interview - Adam Lanphier
    Season 1, Episode 10
    The Three-Body Problem - Liu Cixin

    Episode Info

    • The Three-Body Problem - Liu Cixin

    Description

    • Adam Lanphier has translated short stories by Liu Cixin including "The Village Teacher" and "Cannonball." He is currently working on stories by Ma Boyong

    Topics

    • Original Chinese discussed for The Dark Forest translation: 博士，我真的很赞赏您这种独特的思路，也许这真的是关键所在。” “谢谢，我们真的都是摩登原始人。”
    • Adam's Contact Email: adam.lanphier at gmail

    References

    • Promotional Material for Adam's Work
    • CEPRIDE
    • Adam's Reddit Profile
    • Ma Boyong
    • The Longest Day in Chang'An (Amazon Prime Video)
    • The Wandering Earth
    • To Hold Up The Sky
    • Invisible Planets
